smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Powerhouse market drives fund's price up to record high
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many units as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.heading: Coin Collector Liquidates
smallDeal.description: A coin collector needs cash quick to shore up a tax issue.Will sell you five(5) gold coins, well below going rate.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Sister-In-Law borrows Money
smallDeal.description: Sister-in-law is downsized.Needs $5,000 to make house payment. She promises to pay you back $10,000 after she finds a new job.
smallDeal.rule: If you choose to help. Pay $5,000 and roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-3, She never pays you back and you're out $5,000
Die = 4-6, She pays you back $10,000, but family get-togethers are still awkward

bigDeal.heading: 8-plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Reinvesting owner offers 8-plex for sale at reasonable price. Financing already in place. All it needs is your down payment.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

charity.heading: charity
charity.description: Donate 10% of your total income and use 1 or 2 dice for next 3 turns

downsized.heading: downsized
downsized.description: Pay the amount of your total expenses to the bank and lose 2 turns

baby.heading: New Baby
baby.description: Congratulations! Your family has a new arrival

market.heading: Sewer Line Breaks
market.description: Water is everywhere at your property!.
market.rule: Pay $2000 for a new sewer line(one time). Take out a bank loan if necessary
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it
If you own No real estate. Ignore the card

market.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
market.description: OK4U begins trail on possible life saving drug. Side effects are untested. Could change the world... if it works.
